issue.title: [Rust] Rename union.rs to be cosistent with other arrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10575](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10575). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Each type of array was split into it's own module but union was not renamed to be consistent (it was split out previously)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10575?focusedCommentId=17231448) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8656
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8656>
